home.title: Code, Create, Innovate
home.subtitle: Welcome to my digital workshop. Here you'll find a curated selection of my work, from dynamic web applications to robust full-stack solutions.
hero.title: Hi, I'm a Developer
hero.subtitle: I craft elegant and efficient solutions with code, turning complex problems into intuitive user experiences. Let's build something amazing together.
about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a love for creating beautiful, functional, and user-centric web applications. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I enjoy bringing ideas to life, from concept to deployment. I am a lifelong learner, always excited to explore new technologies and improve my craft.
skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: A glimpse into the technologies and tools I use to build modern web experiences.
projects.title: My Work
projects.description: A selection of projects that showcase my skills and passion for development.
